title: Celebrating Red history
text:
China Daily | Updated: 2019-10-04 11:40

Tourists take photos in front of the sculpture of Jinggang red flag in Jinggangshan city, Jiangxi province. Photos by Wang Jing / China Daily

The Jinggang Mountain in Jiangxi province is the cradle of the Chinese revolution and has fostered the Jinggangshan spirit. As this year marks the 70th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China, the red tourism has developed more vigorously in Jinggangshan city, and in recent years the local government has carried out various kinds of red training and tourism activities to attract tourists to learn about the nation's revolutionary history.

Tourists visit the Jinggangshan Revolution Museum in Jinggangshan city, Jiangxi province.

Tourists watch a large-scale live performance of the Jinggangshan at Red Army theater in Jianggangshan city, Jiangxi province.

A local villager greets a tourist at Maoping township in Jinggangshan city, Jiangxi province.
